title: States step up curbs as Covid-19 cases rage on
description: Gujarat, Uttarakhand and Puducherry became the latest states to impose night curfews to curb Covid-19 cases.

title: Massive free temple campaign impact in Uttrakhand
description: Uttrakhand's chief minister has announced to free 51 temples from government control. The issue of the Devasthanam Board was discussed with the saints. He has decided to rethink the problem, and they will free 51 temples that have been put under the Devasthanam Board. The Devasthanam Board's point was discussed with the saints, and they have decided to rethink it. Justifying the creative act's passage, Tirath Singh Rawat has said the new show would help in the shrines' professional management. Priests and monks from the Himalayan state were furious with the BJP government for passing the law, saying they have been managing these temples' affairs for generations that their ancestors set up. Priest of the Gangotri shrine Rajnikant Semwal had even met Vishva Hindu Parishad and the Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh (RSS).
